name: Pack Bunnies
description:
Download as an APK to add onto your android mobile.

Figure out if bunnies are out on the street because they're ill or because they're breaking confinement! If they are send them PACKING!!

Search for clues that will reveal if the bunnies are sick or not: 

  • Red eyes are a clear sign of sickness. But make sure to use eye drops just in case they're just stoners. 
  • Low hanging bunny ears usually means that the bunny has muscle soreness. But it MUST be affect both ears, and earrings weight the ears down. 
  • Scan the bunnies for their temperatures, red means hot, blue means cold! Some of them might use ice to try and fool you.
